name: S O L A C E
name_original: S O L A C E
description: Two hundred years after the first interstellar travel, the 5th generation of the United Terra Space Alliance sent out the last batch of the Beacon of Last Hope. One of the ships whose mission is in search for a new home encountered a hyperdrive malfunction causing it to crash to unknown planet. With bearings unknown, lost in time and space – survivor’s rover craft, Solace, explores the new world and amidst the tragedy of space tribulation lies a silver lining of a promising hope for a new habitable planet or would it be completely barren?
